thread.title: Husband beats up wife's alleged lover in China
thread.title_full: Husband beats up wife's alleged lover in China | Daily Mail Online

author: Tiffany Lo For Mailonline
title: Husband beats up wife's alleged lover in China
text:
This is the disturbing moment a husband beat up his wife's lover after reportedly catching the couple in bed.
The man apparently caught the pair in a hotel and brought in at least one man and two women to beat the couple.
Video footage shows the alleged lover standing naked and being kicked and punched while trying to cover himself using a pillow.
The wife's alleged lover is seen naked, covering himself with a pillow when the husband attacked him (left). Two women were trying to strip off the wife (right)
The footage is believed to have been filmed in an undisclosed Chinese city.
It first appeared online in 2016 and recently resurfaced on social media.
According to account, the chaos started when the furious husband came to the hotel and caught his wife and her alleged lover together.
A high kick! One of the gang on the bed gave a kick with fury to the alleged lover while another person assaulted the wife who was wearing stripes
The gang brutally punished the couple for having an affair.
At least three men, including the husband can be seen attacking the man's head and chest.
The wife, wearing stripes, struggled to cover herself while the other two women were trying to strip her dress off, according to information suggested by web users.
